comments:
If typing some wrong syntax based on the following gramar rule, no error output is shown. Just the Eclipse console shows some exception output.

xtext rule:

Aspect:
	"Aspect" name=ID
		("extends" aspectGeneralization=AspectGeneralization)?
		("depends" (aspectDependencies+=AspectDependency)+)?
		(hasConfiguration?"hasConfiguration")?
		(hasModel?"hasModel")?
	"{"
		(aspectFeatures+=AspectFeature)*
	"}";

wrong syntax example (missing curly bracket) should show an error output, but validates to true:

Aspect foobar {

console output:

line 3:18: expecting TOKENII, found 'null'
	at antlr.Parser.match(Parser.java:211)
	at de.exxcellent.plexx.parser.xxaspectParser.ruleAspect(xxaspectParser.java:202)
	at de.exxcellent.plexx.parser.xxaspectParser.ruleAspectContainer(xxaspectParser.java:70)
	at de.exxcellent.plexx.xxaspectUtilities.internalParse(xxaspectUtilities.java:31)
	at org.openarchitectureware.xtext.AbstractLanguageUtilities.parse(AbstractLanguageUtilities.java:53)
	at org.openarchitectureware.xtext.editor.XtextReconcilingStrategy.reconcile(XtextReconcilingStrategy.java:91)
	at org.openarchitectureware.xtext.editor.XtextReconcilingStrategy.reconcile(XtextReconcilingStrategy.java:71)
	at org.eclipse.jface.text.reconciler.MonoReconciler.process(MonoReconciler.java:75)
	at org.eclipse.jface.text.reconciler.AbstractReconciler$BackgroundThread.run(AbstractReconciler.java:204)
java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.openarchitectureware.xtext.editor.marker.XtextResourceChangeListener.analyze(XtextResourceChangeListener.java:136)
	at org.openarchitectureware.xtext.editor.marker.XtextResourceChangeListener$2$1.execute(XtextResourceChangeListener.java:101)
	at org.eclipse.ui.actions.WorkspaceModifyOperation$1.run(WorkspaceModifyOperation.java:101)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.Workspace.run(Workspace.java:1737)
	at org.eclipse.ui.actions.WorkspaceModifyOperation.run(WorkspaceModifyOperation.java:113)
	at org.openarchitectureware.xtext.editor.marker.XtextResourceChangeListener$2.run(XtextResourceChangeListener.java:104)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:58)

! But:

Aspect foobar {
Aspect foobar {}

validates to false
